name: autoFRET
description: The autoFRET Python software package consists of three individual applications for hardware control of single- or multiwell measurements (pyMULTI), single-molecule data analysis of raw data (pyBAT_otf/pyBAT), and inspection of analysis results (pyVIZ).
author: Schlierf Group Tu Dresden <michael.schlierf@tu-dresden.de> (https://tu-dresden.de/cmcb/bcube/forschungsgruppen/schlierf)
